s_synopsis: "Hey, kid! Help me out! I've got to run for my life from evil space pirate Blackjack. He wants to conquer the planet with bombs, banana peels and booby traps; and I need all kinds of balloons and klown coins to escape! It's the spookiest, kookiest race you can run, with new diagonal scrolling for pie-in-your-face action! Plus hidden zones, power ups and bonus stages that make it a riot to play every time. So get off your butt! Let's go klown around!"
